mapper.select:
SELECT A.KNUM KNUM ,A.LNAME LNAME ,A.LPRICE LPRICE ,A.LPRICESUM LPRICESUM ,A.LNUM LNUM ,A.MNUM MNUM ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN
FROM KART_TABLE A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y'
ORDER BY 1 DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KART_TABLE (KNUM, LNAME, LPRICE,LNUM,DELETEYN) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(A.KNUM), 0) + 1 AS CHABUN FROM KART_TABLE A), #{lname}, #{lprice}, #{lnum}, 'Y' )
